description: One ingredient is all you'll need for this easy orange marmalade glaze recipe. It's perfect on your Christmas ham and doesn't get easier.
keywords: Glaze,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Ham,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Orange Marmalade Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place marmalade in a small saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until melted.
